requirement.name: On Runway
requirement.description: Aircraft on runway surface from first touchdown till end of landing roll

requirement.name: Bounced landing
requirement.description: Checks if you got airborne again after touchdown

requirement.name: Touchdown on main gear
requirement.description:
Checks pitch attitude on touchdown.
If the aircraft is not level when stationary on ground, you might need to modify this value

requirement.name: Hard landing (fpm)
requirement.description:
Check sink rate at touchdown, relative to runway slope.
 600 feet per minute touchdown rate is used by Boeing to check for hard landings.

requirement.name: Hard landing (g)
requirement.description:
Checks maximum vertical acceleration just after touchdown.
Obviously depends on aircraft.
2.1G should be a good value for most aircraft.

requirement.name: Max sinkrate
requirement.description:
Checks maximum sinkrate during approach.
Most commercial airlines use 1000ft/min as a limit.

TODO: Make it check glideslope angle

requirement.name: Constant sinkrate
requirement.description: Checks difference between maximum and minimum sinkrate during approach.

requirement.name: Glideslope deviation
requirement.description:
Checks max glideslope deviation.
1 dot is the limit for most airlines (CAT 1)

requirement.name: Localizer deviation
requirement.description:
Checks max localizer deviation during approach.
1 dot is the limit for most airlines (CAT 1)

requirement.name: Constant speed
requirement.description:
Checks speed varianz during approach.
There should be no large variation in speed

requirement.name: Tailstrike
requirement.description:
Checks pitch attitude relative to ground on touchdown and during rollout.
If the pitch attitude is too high, you you might have caused a tailstrike!

requirement.name: Gear down
requirement.description: Gear must be down and locked from check height till end of landing roll

requirement.name: Flaps down
requirement.description:
Flaps must be fully extended from check height till end of landing roll

For aicrafts where flaps don't need to be fully extended during landing, you might want to modify this template.

requirement.name: Mixture rich
requirement.description:
When landing at airports with an elevation below 2500ft, mixture must be RICH.
Only for SINGLE engine piston aircrafts

requirement.name: Mixture rich
requirement.description:
When landing at airports with an elevation below 2500ft, mixture must be RICH.
Only for MULTI engine piston aircrafts

requirement.name: Prop rpm full forward
requirement.description:
Check if prop lever (blue) are full forward/high.
 TODO: Explain setup

requirement.name: Speedbrake armed
requirement.description: When performing a full stop landing, speedbrakes must be armed at check height
